## âœ… PROJECT COMPLETED

All menu sections have been digitized and implemented. The website is ready for deployment to GitHub Pages.

## Project Details
- **Type**: Static website (HTML/CSS/JavaScript)
- **Purpose**: Online menu for Brunch da Pampa restaurant
- **Language**: Portuguese
- **Features**:
  - Responsive design
  - Multiple menu sections
  - Price display in euros
  - Modern UI/UX

## Menu Sections
1. Brunch (Salads & Soups)
2. Sands & Toasts
3. Brunch Plates
4. Sweet Tooth
5. Beverages (Coffees, Juices, Smoothies)
6. Cocktails
7. Natural Wines
8. Sharing Plates
